meanings.definition: shmoozed: to chat or gossip in a casual manner
meanings.sent1: We shmoozed about the weather while waiting for the bus.
meanings.sent2: After work, we always shmooze at the coffee shop.
meanings.sent3: During the party, everyone shmoozed happily around the bonfire.
meanings.sent4: The birds outside seem to shmooze all day long in the trees.
meanings.sent5: She shmoozed with her neighbor over the fence, sharing stories.

meanings.sent1: At the park, the families shmoozed about their weekend plans.
meanings.sent2: During the event, people naturally shmooze with each other.
meanings.sent3: The children shmoozed excitedly about their favorite toys.
meanings.sent4: The old friends shmoozed like no time had passed at all.
meanings.sent5: He shmoozed with the new employee to make them feel welcome.

meanings.definition: shmoozed: socializing in a relaxed and informal way
meanings.sent1: In the cozy cafe, friends shmoozed over cups of tea.
meanings.sent2: During the picnic, everyone shmoozes under the shade of the trees.
meanings.sent3: The cats in the neighborhood seem to shmooze lazily in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The group of students shmoozed happily after class.
meanings.sent5: She loves to shmooze with her colleagues during lunch breaks.
